Member of European Parliament Here
    Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the European Parliament from the British Labour Party, and his party arrived here today.
 They were greeted at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and David Arthur Slinn, British ambassador to the DPRK.
